name: friday night funkin corruption unofficial
description:
the corruption is out but not from phantomfear but from me this is the unofficial where you play as the boyfriend and corrupt every last thing in sight

the bonus week is still a work in progress  

UPDATE (minor) during certain songs their will be flashbacks for the enemy which have them look normal and the bf and gf look normal but when they hit the first note or for daddy dearest they will just pop in for a few seconds but the update is not important also normal only works since we only see normal being used in phatomfears videos
